channel.title: podcast on GIVE UP ENGLISH
channel.description: Recent content in podcast on GIVE UP ENGLISH

item.title: Martin Luther King, Jr. - I Have a Dream
item.description: I have a dream that my four little children will one day live in a nation where they will not be judged by the color of their skin but by the content of their character.

item.title: Edison Chen Talks about the Future
item.description: Edison Chen talks about the internet, his mentors, inspirations and get his piece of advice for young creatives and business folks.

item.title: Edison Chen Speaks about Entrepreneurship
item.description: I think one of the most important things is how to mesh what you know and try to bring it to a larger conversation so that everyone does not have to change what they want to do. People may not understand what youâ€™re talking about or what youâ€™re thinking, but if you have a good idea, sooner or later, they are going to jump on and start to give you a praise.

item.title: Daniel Wu - On the Journey
item.description: Can you live as a basic human being?
